originalText.text:
Used them for 2 years, both years I had to show their accountants on how to find a handful of my trades on chain. Crypto is a new industry and I understand there’s not a lot of knowledge in the space but that’s why I paid these guys a premium to handle it.

Wasn’t going to leave a review however an associate of mine used them and has had a nightmare of experience from working with Vick.

If you’re looking for accountants that specialize in crypto don’t go here

originalText.text: The Commerce CPA, LLC Team is the team you can trust for your accounting needs. Vick and his team are not only professional but also efficient and easily available to answer any questions. Completing tax returns can be cumbersome and if mistakes are made (which has happened to me in the past) there are some unpleasant consequences. Commerce CPA is thorough and trustworthy, they allow you to go through tax season stress free. If you are looking for a high quality accounting firm, Commerce CPA, LLC Team, is the one!

originalText.text: This was my first time using a CPA for my personal taxes and Vick was very professional and courteous. He even took the time to breakdown the differences of this year's return versus last. I'm confident in filing my return this year and the process was completely stress-free. Definitely would recommend him to a friend.

originalText.text: Commerce CPA, LLC Team is a very professional accounting service to consider doing business with if you are looking for high quality outcomes. I have trusted Vic and his team with my taxes for the past 2 years and the rapport has been very professional and helpful and the process of completing my taxes has been extremely easy and stress free. I highly recommend Commerce CPA, LLC Team.

originalText.text:
Vick and Commerce CPA are the best accountant and accounting firm I've worked with.

He's very attentive to client needs, asks clarifying questions to find the best solutions, and follows up with you on a frequent basis to provide updates.

I highly recommend him, and have referred four people already, some of them in NYC and the rest in other states.
